tool_description: Calculates optimal chunk parameters based on text length, target chunk size, overlap requirements, and boundary constraints.

text_length.description: Total length of text to be chunked in characters

min_chunk_size.description: Minimum acceptable chunk size in characters

respect_boundaries.description: Whether to adjust chunk sizes to respect text boundaries

error_messages: Invalid text length: Text length must be greater than 0.
Invalid chunk size: Target chunk size must be between 100 and 10000 characters.
Invalid overlap percentage: Overlap percentage must be between 0 and 50.
Invalid min chunk size: Minimum chunk size must be at least 10 characters and less than target chunk size.
usage: Provide text_length and target_chunk_size, optionally configure overlap and boundary settings. Returns optimized chunking parameters.

optimal_chunk_size.description: Calculated optimal chunk size in characters

overlap_chars.description: Number of overlapping characters between chunks

estimated_chunks.description: Estimated number of chunks to be created

step_size.description: Step size for moving window (chunk_size - overlap)
